item.title: Keira Knightley Claims to Have Witnessed a Murder in Netflix’s ‘Woman in Cabin 10’ Trailer
item.description: Guy Pearce and Hannah Waddingham co-star in Simon Stone’s thriller that adapts Ruth Ware’s novel.
